title: The Ministry of Missing Things
tagline: In a newborn nation stripped of doorknobs, a woman builds a machine to make sense of the absurd.
themes: Mechanisms as Refuge from Political Farce
The Inherited Burden of Unfinished Revolutions

story: Write a scene where a character must negotiate for a vital resource (water, medicine, fuel) using only the bureaucratic language of a now-irrelevant colonial manual.

Compose a monologue from Auntie Precious's perspective as she organizes the first post-independence national holiday, navigating between tradition, political spectacle, and a severe shortage of tablecloths.
Describe the moment a minor female clerk in the new ministry discovers a hidden room containing something the British didn't take—something utterly mundane yet symbolically explosive.
Imagine a dialogue between Makeda's machine and the ghost of the colonial surveyor whose theodolite lens she salvaged. What does the machine see that he never could?
technical: Build a digital 'Sundries Ledger'—an interactive archive that catalogs not just what was taken, but the functional and philosophical void each missing item left behind, allowing users to draw connections between absences.

Design a text-based game where the player, as a protocol officer in the new state, must navigate a day of diplomatic visits with a constantly shifting set of broken tools, missing documents, and performative expectations.

cover_prompt: A determined woman in a modest 1960s dress meticulously assembles a complex, Rube Goldberg-like machine of polished brass, salvaged wood, and repurposed colonial artifacts within a stark, bureaucratic office, its walls lined with empty filing cabinets and doorframes conspicuously lacking knobs, under the watchful, absurd gaze of a portrait of a pompous official, in the evocative, surrealist style of Wangechi Mutu and the detailed magical realism of Leonora Carrington, book cover framing, centered composition with a slightly low-angle view emphasizing the machine's towering, fragile complexity against the barren office, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting with a single shaft of warm, hopeful light illuminating the machine's core against cool, oppressive shadows of grey and muted olive green, masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev
